name: Hunting Eye
description:
you have a flashlight with limited battery, you can switch it on and off by pressing space

Your flashlight charges automacilly when closed, if you run out of battery, it will never recharge again and you will be doomed!

You will see a platform infront of you, a monster randomly appears there. If you hear footsteps, it means that the monster has come, and is currently staring you from one of the holes at the wall. Locate it's eye, and poke it (by clicking the eye) to prevent it from killing you.

This game will never end, you can see your score once the monster gets you. Good luck!
